name: Dog Cooling Mat
imageAlt: Large self-cooling gel mat for dogs in blue with paw print pattern
shortDescription: Keep your pup cool and comfortable with a pressure-activated cooling mat built for Singapore's heat.
description: When the Singapore sun is relentless, your dog needs a cool retreat. This pressure-activated gel mat provides instant relief, dropping up to 8 degrees below ambient temperature the moment your dog lies down. No electricity or freezing needed — just unfold and let your dog discover their new favourite chill-out spot.
features: Pressure-activated cooling gel drops temperature up to 8°C
Large 90x60cm size fits medium to large breed dogs
Tear-resistant nylon shell withstands scratching and chewing
Self-recharging — reactivates after 20 minutes of non-use
Non-toxic, pet-safe gel sealed in leak-proof compartments
